name: BUTCHERBOX
description:
How long can you last in a box flooding with vicious monsters?
Pretty weapons might distract you, but not them. You're gonna have to prove your metal.
Challenge your friends, challenge the world. Fight for rank!

Did I mention the lead is unlimited?


Key Features:

  • Leaderboards (Global, Friends)
  • 8 Weapons with a Variety of Skins each
  • 8 Unique Enemies
  • Random Arenas and Backdrops
